jserver
Class JServer

java.lang.Object
  jserver.JServer

public class JServer
extends java.lang.Object

The main class for the server. Creates the UDP and TCP threads.

Constructor Summary
JServer(JServerForm form, int port)
          Creates both the UDP and TCP threads.
 
Method Summary

          The main entry point of the server.

Constructor Detail

JServer

public JServer(JServerForm form,
               int port)
Creates both the UDP and TCP threads.

Parameters:
form - the servers GUI form.
port - the port servers TCP and UDP should use.
Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The main entry point of the server. This is also where the server GUI form is created.

Parameters:
args - startup arguments, this should be the server port.
